<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 22"
    pfs=""
>
[Spiral Athame](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1817)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 79

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The pommel of this +4 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [disruptive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [ghost touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) [high-grade silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) is a black glass orb that contains a tiny blue comet that spirals through the orb's interior. Strikes with the dagger deal an additional 1d8 positive damage to worshippers of [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19) and to anyone who has ever created or [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=154) an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature.

 While the dagger is in your possession, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) checks and to [Midwifery Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) checks. If you're a worshipper of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), you gain [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) with a range of 60 feet while holding the dagger. If you're undead or a worshipper of Urgathoa, you're [stupefied 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) while holding the dagger.

 Despite its utility in combat, the _Spiral Athame_ is intended as a ritual implement, meant to bless newborns and protect them from the predations of undead. If you use the _Spiral Athame_ to cut the umbilical cord of a newly born creature, that creature gains resistance to negative damage equal to their level (minimum 1) and gains a +2 status bonus to saving throws against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects and [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117). These bonuses are permanent. Additionally, that creature can never become an undead creature.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, interact ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117))    **Effect** You point the _Spiral Athame_ at a corpse within 30 feet, shielding it from corruption. The _Spiral Athame_ casts 5th-level [_gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131) on the corpse.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, interact ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117))    **Effect** You point the _Spiral Athame_ to the sky and pray, warding creatures against undead. This has the effect of 3rd-level [_circle of protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=38), except it wards against undead creatures rather than creatures of a specified alignment, and the emanation is centered on the _Spiral Athame_.

**Destruction** If an undead creature uses the _Spiral Athame_ to slay a [psychopomp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=83) usher while within the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=15), the _Spiral Athame's_ pommel shatters and the _Spiral Athame_ becomes a mundane, high-grade silver dagger with no special abilities. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spiral Athame
